name: Taser Gun Prank Simulator
description:
Prank your friends and have great fun with 3D Shock Taser Gun Prank Simulator!

Can you hear the buzzy stun gun sounds approaching? It's time to blow your mind and play some shocking pranks on your friends!

Perfect app for pranking tools with electric taser and machine gun sounds. We bring you the best interactive experience with a wide choice of 3D gun simulator.

Features
- A wide choice of shock tasers, machine guns and skins.
- Buzzy taser and reverberating gun sounds.
- Stunning 3D graphics gun simulator with high quality effects.
- Synced sound, flash and vibration.
- Awesome skins in the style of epic, anime and sci fi.
- Accurately simulate tough striking recoils.
- Excellent app for pranking.
- Unique and creative game modes to try both real and fictional weapons.
- Interesting information for each of the selected guns.

Get ready to strike a thunderous electric Stun Gun, spray rounds and rounds of Machine Gun and be overwhelmed with Special Gun designs. Why don't you try 3D Shock Taser Gun Prank Simulator now?

This is a game that contains weapons, gun sounds and electric rays are realistic. However, they are fake 3D guns in the app, not real guns. There is not the slightest chance you might get hurt or electrocuted. Life could be tough, but not our app.
